entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:47 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:47 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
